title: Understanding the Concept
text: The average temperature calculated from the data of $$365$$ daily readings is a summary measure of the data. It represents a single value that describes the central tendency of the dataset.

title: Defining Terms
text: A 'statistic' is a numerical value that summarizes or describes a characteristic of a sample. In this case, the average temperature is a statistic because it summarizes the temperature data collected over the year.

title: Identifying the Correct Term
text: Which term best describes a numerical summary of a sample, such as the average temperature from $$365$$ readings?
